name: deep sea hat
notes:
this pretty textured hat with folded up ribbed brim  is crocheted in rows from side to side, with the brim, the body of the hat and the top crown part made all in one piece.

the pattern is quite easy to crochet, once you get familiar with the special stitches used. you will only need to repeat 4 rows!
